about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Who I Am
about.intro:
Hey there, I'm Anne!
I found my passion for coding through design.
I love turning ideas into real, working things. Learning to code is a never-ending journey, and what keeps me going is the sense of progress I feel after every little breakthrough and the excitement of turning challenges into solutions.
about.location: I'm based in Leipzig, Germany, and open to working both locally and remotely.
about.learning: I'm always curious to learn new technologies and enjoy the challenge of figuring things out. Learning and growing is what drives me.
about.creativity: I approach problems with creativity and persistence. I love bouncing ideas off others — it's one of the best ways to grow.

skills.title: Skill Set
skills.subtitle: Technologies
skills.intro: I’m experienced with various front-end and design tools, and I’m always eager to learn new technologies. Keeping up with the rapid changes in web development is important to me, and I enjoy adapting quickly to stay current and deliver the best results.
skills.question: You need another skill?
skills.invitation: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

portfolio.subtitle: Portfolio
portfolio.title: Featured Projects
portfolio.intro:
Explore a selection of my work here -
Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

join.name: Join
join.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

el_pollo_loco.name: El Pollo Loco
el_pollo_loco.description: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

da_bubble.name: DA Bubble
da_bubble.description: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.

contactSection.boldText: Hast du ein Problem zu lösen?
contactSection.description: Ermutige Leute, dich zu kontaktieren und beschreibe, für welche Rolle du dich interessierst. Zeige, dass du durch deine Arbeit Mehrwert für ihre Projekte bringst.
